className.transform: (() => { const modifiers = { text: 'skeleton--text', rectangular: 'skeleton--rectangular', circular: 'skeleton--avatar', rounded: 'skeleton--rounded' }; return 'skeleton ' + (modifiers[data] || modifiers.rectangular); })()

style.transform: ([w, h]) => ({ width: typeof w === 'number' ? `${w}px` : w, height: typeof h === 'number' ? `${h}px` : h })
